transArray.content: The hotel is very close to the subway station, just a few minutes' walk away. It shares the parking lot with the car dealer, which is very convenient! The facilities are quite complete. There are small signs on the table and there are many things you can borrow. They are very considerate. It's a very well-designed store. There are mirrors everywhere in the room and corridors, which are very practical!

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your recognition of the hotel's environment and services. Your satisfaction is the driving force for our progress. The hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the Fourth Ring Road. It shares parking spaces with the park. There are sufficient parking spaces and is close to You can park for free just by picking up the electronic parking coupon at the front desk. The hotel is surrounded by public transportation and is located 300 to 500 meters from Metro Line 6. It is very convenient and is your best choice for business trip and accommodation. All the hotel staff look forward to welcoming you. For every patronage, I wish you success in your work! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
